nodes.text: Delrian was a prison world in the Galactic Republic, Galactic Empire and New Republic. It was the second planet in its system.
Prisoners worked the crust's mines; the ores extracted were exported to fund the prison.

Nuri the Clawdite freed Wat Tambor from imprisonment on Delrian. Doctor Cornelius Evazan later escaped from the planet after he was institutionalized there. Under the New Republic, the prison was overseen by Wardex Simyl Fruul, who had to handle a prisoner revolt assisted by corrupt staffers at Mine Head 37.
